title: Baphomet

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Cut a player who has not completed the maze in half during the day, attacking them.
- Choose a dead player who youâ€™ve cleaved in half. They are resurrected as a Minotaur. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, every living player except for you is shown an incomplete maze that they must solve each night.
- During the day, a Minotaur may choose a player. If the Minotaur successfully submits the solution to the maze before their target, their target is roleblocked if their target submits a solution less than 12 hours after the Minotaur, or is dealt a basic attack if they took 12 or more hours than the Minotaur to complete the maze.
- Your defense value is raised to Invincible if half of the current surviving players submit a solution within the first 12 hours of a night phase

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have a night where every single alive player submits a correct solution to your maze before the game ends.
